title: What Stars Are Made Of
description: Sometimes it's our darkest moments that make us shine.The maker of stars journeys hidden in the night-time to collect the sorrow, the sadness and the anger from children. Taking it back to his secret lab, he works to build a new star; a beacon of light and hope, so the world can be a brighter place once again.This heartfelt story is told through 21 magical hand-painted illustrations, and will be sure to leave you feeling warm and fuzzy.For children of all ages.
author: Z.R. Southcombe
